title: Crypto Bulls Hit by $300M in Liquidations as Bitcoin, Ether Buckle on Fizzling ETF Momentum
description: Tuesday's sharp decline in crypto prices spurred the largest daily leveraged long liquidation since August, CoinGlass data shows.

title: You Could Win Part of $1 Million Worth of Prizes Playing Fortnite—Here's How
description: Crypto gaming startup Unix Gaming is offering up prizes to Fortnite players this week, with Counter-Strike 2 and other games ahead.

title: Mind-Reading AI Turns Thoughts Into Text, Gives ALS Patient His Voice Back
description: Using brainwave sensors and AI, Unbabel’s new Project Halo hears messages and generates silent replies. Just think about it and the machine does all the work.

title: An NFT Rug Pull Scammer Has Finally Been Convicted, Faces Federal Prison
description: Aurelien Michel, creator of the Mutant Ape Planet NFT project, faces up to five years in federal prison after pleading guilty Tuesday to wire fraud charges.

title: Opyn founders exit crypto industry following CFTC regulatory actions
description:
On Nov. 14, Zubin Koticha and Alexis Gauba, the co-founders of Opyn, an Ethereum-based options trading platform, announced their decision to step down from their project and leave the crypto industry altogether. Zubin Koticha, co-founder at Opyn, wrote: “Hey Crypto Twitter … This one’s a tough one. After the regulatory action against Opyn, [co-founder Alexis […]

The post Opyn founders exit crypto industry following CFTC regulatory actions appeared first on CryptoSlate.
